title: Reserved IP Ranges Reference
description: Special-purpose IP address ranges defined by RFCs and their intended uses.

notices.privateNetwork: Private Network: Not routed on the public Internet
notices.reserved: Reserved: Not assigned for general use

understanding.title: Understanding Reserved IP Ranges
understanding.content: IP address ranges are reserved for special purposes to ensure proper Internet operation and avoid conflicts.

private.title: Private Networks (RFC 1918)
private.content: Used in local networks, not routed on the Internet

linkLocal.title: Link-Local (RFC 3927)
linkLocal.content: Automatic IP assignment when DHCP is unavailable

usage.title: Usage Guidelines
points: Private ranges are safe for internal use
Documentation ranges are for examples only

planning.title: Network Planning
planning.content: Choose appropriate ranges based on your network size and routing requirements.
